sentence: In 1999, it was certified 3 × platinum by the British Phonographic Industry (BPI), 3 × Platinum by the Australian Record Industry Association and platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA).

positive_examples.sentence: The initial volume of the album set (Anthology 1) was released the same week of the documentary's airdate, with the subsequent two volumes (Anthology 2 and Anthology 3) released in 1996.
